reasoning: Moderate readability. The ternary keeps it compact and guards division. However if getJaca and getEspinafre return integers, the division may be integer division and lose precision when the result is promoted to double. The code relies on Portuguese names which may hinder non Portuguese readers. A cast to double or ensuring the operands are doubles would improve clarity.
